articles.title: Deco avança para tribunal contra Apple por manipulação de desempenho dos iPhones 6
articles.description: Acusa-a de práticas enganosas por ter manipulado os iPhones 6, 6 Plus, 6S e 6S Plus para se tornarem obsoletos.
articles.content:
A Deco Proteste anunciou esta segunda-feira que avançou com uma ação judicial contra a Apple, acusando-a de práticas enganosas por ter manipulado os iPhones 6, 6 Plus, 6S e 6S Plus para se tornarem obsoletos e, assim, ter lesado 115.000 portugueses.
... [1716 chars]

articles.title: iPhone 13 release date: When can we expect to see the new phones?
articles.description: It may seem like the iPhone 12 just came out, but Apple is already looking towards the iPhone 13. Here's what we know about a potential release date.
articles.content:
Andrew Hoyle/CNET
Though it's been only a few months since the iPhone 12 went on sale, Apple is already setting its sights on its next flagship smartphone, the iPhone 13 (or whatever it ends up being called). We're expecting to see four versions of t... [1712 chars]

articles.title: The Real Reason Why Billie Eilish Broke up With Her Boyfriend Q
articles.description: She is the subject of an Apple TV+ documentary chronicling her experiences as a musician. The film marks the first time Eilish has been candid about her former romantic relationship with another musician.
articles.content:
Billie Eilish is an American singer and songwriter who has been a force to be reckoned with in the music community. Eilish first entered the mainstream pop scene and is best known for her successful debut single, “Ocean Eyes.”

articles.title: Huawei Says It's Not An Electric Car Company, Yet
articles.description: While Apple takes it's time making a car, Huawei is now reportedly aiming for its own electrice vehicle release by the end of 2021.
articles.content:
Huawei Says It’s Not An Electric Car Company, Yet
We shouldn’t expect anything resembling a car from Apple in the next few years due to the company’s infamous slow-and-steady R&D, but another Big Tech company, Huawei, is now reportedly aiming for its... [3073 chars]

articles.title: Apple Really Could Be Offering a 1TB iPhone 13
articles.description: More rumours about an alleged 1TB iPhone 13 are dropping. Here's everything you need to know about it so far.
articles.content:
Apple Really Could Be Offering a 1TB iPhone 13

articles.title: Apple volta a ceder a leis de França
articles.description: A empresa será obrigada a exibir as avaliações de reparação dos respetivos produtos.
articles.content: Parece que a Apple voltou a ceder perante as leis francesas, com o site MacGeneration a avançar que a empresa será obrigada a obedecer a um novo regulamento em França (aprovado em janeiro) que a obriga a exibir na respetiva loja as avaliações de repa... [489 chars]

articles.title: Ted Lasso gagne un match aux Golden Globes 2021
articles.description: Apple est repartie des Golden Globes 2021 avec une récompense, celle du meilleur acteur dans une série (comédie), pour Jason Sudeikis qui interprète Ted Lasso dans la série du même nom. articles.title: iPhone bridés : le Portugal prépare son action collective
articles.description: Après la Belgique, l'Espagne et l'Italie c'est au tour d'une association de défense des consommateurs portugais de se rappeler au bon souvenir d'Apple en relançant l'affaire des batteries des iPhone 6 et 6s. articles.title: Apple ha una nuova app per Android? Ecco le 5 novità del Google Play Store di questa settimana!
articles.description: Ecco 5 app recentemente sbarcate sul Google Play Store che pensiamo possano interessarvi, una è stata realizzata da Apple!
articles.content:
È nuovamente lunedì e chi ci segue regolarmente saprà di certo cosa questo significa: è arrivato il momento di presentarvi cinque nuove applicazioni che hanno raggiunto da poco il Google Play Store.

articles.title: Les notes de réparabilité des iPhone sont passables
articles.description: Apple a rendu public l’indice de réparabilité de ses smartphones, inférieur aux scores moyens des mobiles concurrents.
articles.content:
La vitre d’un smartphone cassé dans une boutique de réparation. NICOLAS SIX
Gradué de 1 à 10, l’indice de réparabilité renseigne sur la facilité avec laquelle on peut réparer ou faire réparer un appareil électronique. Mis en place depuis début janvie... [4196 chars]
